subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Olympic Games
Canoes and Canoeing
lead_paragraph: The former Olympic canoeing silver medalist Nathan Baggaley faces more drug charges after being arrested with his brother for the manufacturing and trafficking of ecstasy in Australia. Baggaley, who won two silver medals at the 2004 Athens Olympics, has been told that he could not return to competition because of other pending drug charges after serving a two-year ban for taking steroids.
